text: Lin Moyu (Chinese: 林默予; 1 July 1924 – 1 July 2020) was a Chinese actress. She was known for her role in the movie series A Dream of Red Mansions. She won a Golden Rooster Award in 1990. Lin Moyu died on her 96th birthday on 1 July 2020. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Chinese movie actors
title: Lin Moyu
